DOC.brief_summary: We hypothesized that providing physicians treating with HIV disease, at the time of a routine outpatient visit, with a detailed report describing patients' adherence with HIV antiretroviral medications, would improve the quality of the physician-patient interaction, and also patients' subsequent adherence.
DOC.brief_title: Physician Focused Intervention to Improve Adherence With HIV Antiretrovirals
DOC.criteria: on ART willing to use MEMS cap speaks and reads English detectable viral loads uses a pill box
